software.description: Ghost is an open source publishing platform which is beautifully designed, easy to use, and free for everyone.
software.about: Ghost is an open source publishing platform which is beautifully designed, easy to use, and free for everyone.
software.custom_start_script:
#!/bin/bash
PID_FILE=/var/run/engines/pid
export PID_FILE
if ! test -f  /home/fs/config_and_data/.configured
 then
    cp -r /home/fs_src/config_and_data /home/fs
    touch /home/fs/config_and_data/.configured
 fi
. /home/trap.sh
mkdir -p  /engines/var/run/flags/
cd /home/app

 npm start --production > /var/log/ghost.log &

pid=$!
echo $pid >$PID_FILE
touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
wait
sleep 600
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
software.custom_install_script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /home/app
npm update npm
npm install --production
